about_the_game:
Unlock the following skins by purchasing the Bright Memory: Infinite Energetic DLC

Please note that the skins contained in this DLC can also be unlocked in-game by completing specific requirements.

*Turning on Perspective-assist will allow you to view custom skins during certain scenes.


  • Energetic: Shelia (Character costume)
  • Assault Rifle: Enamel Blue (Weapon skin)
  • Shotgun: Enamel Blue (Weapon skin)
  • Handgun: Enamel Blue (Weapon skin)
  • Sniper Rifle: Enamel Blue (Weapon skin)
  • Hybrid Sword: Dragon & Tiger (Weapon skin)
  • 4K wallpaper for PC and smartphone wallpaper (Saved in game installation folder)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit（1903）
  • Processor: INTEL E3-1230v2 / AMD FX-8350
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 MB available space
